Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Na prodaju: Kuća s tri stambene jedinice i parkingom – 300 m od centra Trogira Prodaje se kuća u Trogiru, smještena na parceli površine 438 m², svega 300 metara zapadno od centra grada, 100m od mora u blizini trgovačkog centra Plodine. Kuća se sastoji od prizemlja i kata, s ukupnotri stambene jedinice i ukupnom korisnom površinom od cca 120 m². Raspored prostora: Prizemlje: 1-sobni stan (30 m²) s balkonom 2-sobni stan (40 m²) s balkonom Kat: Komforni 2-sobni stan s terasom od 10 m² Dvorište je prostrano i uređeno te omogućuje parking za 4–5 automobila. Cijena: 290.000 € Izvrsna prilika za obiteljsku kuću, apartmanski najam ili investiciju u turizam. Za više informacija i dogovor oko razgledavanja, slobodno nas kontaktirajte. Ugovor o posredovanju For Sale: House with Three Residential Units and Parking – 300 m from the Center of Trogir A house for sale in Trogir, situated on a 438 m² plot, just 300 meters west of the town center, near the Plodine supermarket. The property consists of a ground floor and one upper floor, with a total of three residential units and a total living area of approx. 140 m². Layout: Ground floor: One-bedroom apartment (30 m²) with a balcony Two-bedroom apartment (40 m²) with a balcony First floor: Spacious two-bedroom apartment with a 10 m² terrace The courtyard is spacious and well maintained, with parking space for 4 to 5 vehicles. Price: €290,000 An excellent opportunity for a family home, holiday rentals, or a tourism investment. For more information or to arrange a viewing, feel free to contact us.
